title: Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Teacher-Ranger-Teachers Canal Classroom Corps teachers, rangers, and volunteers deliver educational programs to school groups in the park and at schools.  All Teacher-Ranger-Teachers   Canal Classroom Corps    Join the Corps! Learn More     Teacher Workshops Teachers in neighboring counties help develop in-park programs connected to State and Common Core Standards. All Teacher Workshops   Curriculum Development Workshops    Wanted: Creative Teachers Learn More
